properties.name: Bristol Motor Speedway
properties.description: Posted by Haribans29151 Speedway Blvd. 37620I went here this year and saw Jeff Burton win!

properties.description: Posted by Haribans29135 Shiloh Road, Greeneville, TN 37743I attended their first ever home game with my dad.

properties.name: Myrtle Beach Speedway
properties.description: Posted by Haribans29  4300 HIGHWAY 501. MYRTLE BEACH, SC 29579 I watched a race here when I went to the beach last summer.

properties.name: Newport Speedway
properties.description: Posted by Haribans29767 Industrial Road. Newport, TN 37821I live about 25 minutes from this track. I have a few friends who race here on the weekends, and I usually try to go watch them race.

properties.name: Philadelphia Phillies Stadium
properties.description: Posted by Haribans29One Citizens Bank Way. Philadelphia, PA 19148I watched the Phillies and the Rockies play. The Phillies won the game but I think they lost the series.

properties.name: Tennessee Smokies Stadium
properties.description: Posted by Haribans293540 Line Drive, Kodak, TN 37764I go to so many of these games its not even funny.

properties.name: Volunteer Speedway
properties.description: Posted by Haribans2914095 Andrew Johnson HwyThis has to be one of the fastest dirt tracks on the planet.
